column1: nomination of the Petitioner and 7th Respondent as co-successors made on
17.12.2008.  Accordingly,  as  the  said  nomination  of  the  Petitioner  and  7th
Petitioner as successor dated 02.04.2008 would be valid before law. As such,
I am inclined to grant the Writ of Certiorari and Writ of Mandamus as prayed
in the prayers (b) and (d) of the Petition. The Petitioner is not entitled to cost.
